item.title: Leslie add a quote by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "If you treat an individual as he is, he will remain how he is. But if you treat him as if he were what he ought to be and could be, he will become what he ought to be and could be." -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Elsa Schiaparelli
item.description: "A good cook is like a sorceress who dispenses happiness." -- Elsa Schiaparelli

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Confucius
item.description: "To put the world in order, we must first put the nation in order; to put the nation in order, we must first put the family in order; to put the family in order; we must first cultivate our personal life; we must first set our hearts right." -- Confucius
